messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: This List
messages.msgSnippet: Don t even start on the weather!  It has been absolutely cr*ppy this year!!!  We usually have a garden that is keeping me busy in the ktichen by now and it is
messages.messageBody:
Don't even start on the weather! It has been absolutely cr*ppy this
year!!! We usually have a garden that is keeping me busy in the ktichen by
now and it is just getting started %-{

Lynda

----------

> To: Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: This List

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: This List
messages.msgSnippet: Here! Here! Nanci. I agree that this thread has gotten rather heated, but we are all mature adults and I think we can handle it. After all the list would be
messages.messageBody:
Here! Here! Nanci. I agree that this thread has gotten rather heated, but we
are all mature adults and I think we can handle it. After all the list would
be pretty boring if we talked about the weather all of the time.
Amy
----- Original Message -----
From: Nanci and Thomas Kuykendall <tn-k4of5@...>
To: <unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, June 24, 2000 9:42 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: This List


> You know, the first few days I was on this list, I didn't get ANYTHING.
When I posted to ask why, I was told that it was brand new and no-one was
here yet! Tee hee...Imagine that, me an old timer at 27. :-) I have seen
plenty of heated topics come and go, and the latest one shall too.
>
> What a wonderful resource this list has been for me, and I love you all
for your many and diverse contributions. How wonderful that we do NOT all
agree on every topic, so that we may learn from and be enriched by each
other's diversity. Drink deeply and be refreshed! But don't gorge yourself
or you will get sick! :-)
>
> Nanci K.

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: This List
messages.msgSnippet: I would like to add also that all of us are different,thank Goodness ... bunch of woman together we are  not all going to see things the same way.Yes we do
messages.messageBody:
I would like to add also that all of us are different,thank Goodness
:)We will have varying opinions,very diverse thoughts ..When you get a
bunch of woman together we are not all going to see things the same
way.Yes we do differ on things,which I think is healthy.Even though we
are all unschoolers we still are unique individuals with our own
brains,and we are going to have our own thoughts and opinionns on
matters.
I don't think it is good to agree with something or someone just to keep
peace.Thats not healthy!
I don't believe in bashing anyone if their opinion differs from mine,and
that is not a good thing,but for the most part I think we haven't done
that.We are all entitled to have our say .I am glad everyone is
different,this world would be a very boring place!I like diversity :)
Have a great day everyone...Deb
